actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime.

official_title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide for reciprocity in regard to the manner in which nonresidents of a State may carry certain concealed firearms in the State.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to permit any person who is not subject to a Federal firearms prohibition and who is licensed or otherwise entitled to carry a concealed firearm in one State to carry a concealed firearm under the same terms in any State, subject to each State's restrictions concerning locations in which firearms may not be carried.

titles.title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide for reciprocity in regard to the manner in which nonresidents of a State may carry certain concealed firearms in the State.
